full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 782 Filed 01/15/25 Page 8 of 158 8 LBAAMAX1ps Rocchio - Direct 1 Dr. Rocchio, can you please describe your educational background. 2 A. I have a master's degree and a doctoral degree in clinical 3 psychology. 4 THE COURT: I need you to speak up. Sorry. 5 A. I have a master's degree and a doctoral degree in clinical 6 psychology. 7 8 THE COURT: Thank you. 9 Q. And taking a step back, before your master's degree and 10 your other, and your Ph.D., did you receive an undergraduate 11 degree? 12 A. I have a bachelor's degree with a dual major in psychology 13 and English. 14 Q. Where did you receive your master's from? 15 A. The University of Rhode Island. 16 Q. And you mentioned your Ph.D. Where did you receive that 17 from? 18 A. That was also from the University of Rhode Island. 19 Q. What is clinical psychology? 20 A. Clinical psychology is the study of human thoughts and 21 behaviors, both abnormal and normal. We also study 22 psychopathology, treatment methods. But it's generally the 23 study of human behavior. 24 Q. Can you describe your coursework and training in connection 25 with your master's and Ph.D. degree.  SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00014884

1 Dr. Rocchio, can you please describe your educational background. 2 A. I have a master's degree and a doctoral degree in clinical 3 psychology. 4 THE COURT: I need you to speak up. Sorry. 5 A. I have a master's degree and a doctoral degree in clinical 6 psychology. 7 8 THE COURT: Thank you. 9 Q. And taking a step back, before your master's degree and 10 your other, and your Ph.D., did you receive an undergraduate 11 degree? 12 A. I have a bachelor's degree with a dual major in psychology 13 and English. 14 Q. Where did you receive your master's from? 15 A. The University of Rhode Island. 16 Q. And you mentioned your Ph.D. Where did you receive that 17 from? 18 A. That was also from the University of Rhode Island. 19 Q. What is clinical psychology? 20 A. Clinical psychology is the study of human thoughts and 21 behaviors, both abnormal and normal. We also study 22 psychopathology, treatment methods. But it's generally the 23 study of human behavior. 24 Q. Can you describe your coursework and training in connection 25 with your master's and Ph.D. degree.
